activities.name: Wine Tasting at Château Merveille
activities.text: Experience a guided wine tasting at the enchanting Château Merveille vineyard.

activities.name: Culinary Walking Tour
activities.text: Embark on a gastronomic adventure with a guided culinary walking tour through local markets and eateries.

activities.name: Sunset Cruise
activities.text: Enjoy a romantic sunset cruise along the picturesque coastline, complete with gourmet appetizers and wine.

activities.name: Cooking Class
activities.text: Learn the secrets of regional cuisine in a hands-on cooking class led by a renowned chef.

activities.name: Visit to Artisanal Cheese Farm
activities.text: Tour an artisanal cheese farm and witness the cheese-making process, followed by a tasting session.

activities.name: Local Market Exploration
activities.text: Discover the rich history of a city's food and drink scene through a guided historical tour.

activities.name: Historic Food and Drink Tour
activities.text: Walk along the majestic Great Wall of China.

activities.name: Wine and Cheese Pairing
activities.text: Indulge in a delightful wine and cheese pairing experience at a charming vineyard.

activities.name: Chocolate Making Workshop
activities.text: Unleash your inner chocolatier in a hands-on workshop where you create your own chocolates.

activities.name: Farm-to-Table Dinner
activities.text: Savor a farm-fresh, multi-course dinner prepared by a local chef using ingredients sourced directly from nearby farms.

activities.name: Oyster Tasting by the Sea
activities.text: Enjoy a seaside oyster tasting experience, sampling a variety of freshly shucked oysters paired with fine wines.

activities.name: Brewery Tour and Beer Tasting
activities.text: Take a behind-the-scenes brewery tour, followed by a beer tasting of craft brews.

activities.name: Truffle Hunting Expedition
activities.text: Join a truffle hunter and their trusty canine companion on an exciting truffle hunting adventure.

activities.name: Tivoli Gardens
activities.text: Enjoy the enchanting Tivoli Gardens.

activities.name: Hagia Sophia
activities.text: Visit the magnificent Hagia Sophia.

activities.name: Blue Mosque
activities.text: Admire the stunning architecture of the Blue Mosque.

activities.name: Sydney Opera House
activities.text: Experience a performance at the Sydney Opera House.

activities.name: Bondi Beach
activities.text: Relax and surf at the famous Bondi Beach.

activities.name: Palacio de Bellas Artes
activities.text: Admire the stunning architecture of Palacio de Bellas Artes.

activities.name: Teotihuacan
activities.text: Explore the ancient city of Teotihuacan.

activities.name: Machu Picchu
activities.text: Discover the awe-inspiring ruins of Machu Picchu.

activities.name: Table Mountain
activities.text: Take a cable car up Table Mountain for breathtaking views.

activities.name: Cape of Good Hope
activities.text: Visit the iconic Cape of Good Hope.
